summary: Request to implement a workflow replayer for the Ruby SDK with capabilities to stream histories, similar to existing implementations in Python and .NET SDKs.
userImpact: Users can test and debug workflows by replaying them with recorded histories, improving workflow reliability and troubleshooting capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement workflow replayer with history streaming capabilities, following patterns from Python and .NET SDK implementations.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented in the Ruby SDK with workflow replayer and history streaming capabilities.
keyQuote: Implement workflow replayer, including capabilities commonly seen in Python and .NET to stream histories
